## 2. Project overview ğŸŒ¾ğŸ“Š

### 2.1 Project idea (short description)
In few sentences, describe: <br/>
- the agricultural context (what system/crop/problem?) <br/>
- The purpose of this data analysis project will be to examine P rates and sources in RCBD plots in two locations.
- Soil data was collected at the plot level which can be connected to the fertilizer rate to see amount of P in each plot
- To hopefully re-evaluate current P rates in corn and soybean in southern Ontario
- the data science task (what will you do with the data?) <br/>
- Explore the data to see if there is any correlation or relationship between P level and certain realtive yield values. 
- Explore the variables to uncover any other correlations or realtionships in the data.

### 2.2 Motivation / why it matters ğŸŒ

-  Intrestingly, this project soil samples at the plot level and not the block level to uncover soil nutrient spiatial variability.
